alert.note: Alert for Interstate 5 Corridor; Northern Ventura County Mountains; Santa Barbara County Interior Mountains (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Advisory issued November 17 at 12:39PM PST until November 17 at 10:00PM PST by NWS Oxnard
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 PM PST THIS EVENING... ...HIGH WIND WATCH IN EFFECT FROM LATE SATURDAY NIGHT THROUGH SUNDAY EVENING... * WHAT...For the Wind Advisory, south winds 20 to 30 mph with gusts up to 50 mph. For the High Wind Watch, north winds 25 to 40 mph with gusts of 60 to 80 mph possible and locally higher gusts also possible. * WHERE...Santa Barbara County Interior Mountains, Northern Ventura County Mountains and Interstate 5 Corridor. * WHEN...For the Wind Advisory, until 10 PM PST this evening. For the High Wind Watch, from late Saturday night through Sunday evening. * IMPACTS...Damaging winds could blow down large objects such as trees and power lines. Power outages are possible. Travel could be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...High-wind headlines may need to be extended into Monday while being expanded eastward and southward. This would come with the transition to a potentially strong Santa Ana pattern and winds shifting to northeasterly early next week.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts and warnings for updates on this situation. Fasten loose objects or shelter objects in a safe location prior to the onset of winds.

area.areaDesc: Interstate 5 Corridor; Northern Ventura County Mountains; Santa Barbara County Interior Mountains
